name: 42nd Blockade
description:
Faced with a post-apocalyptic world roaming with robots and contaminated folks, your life is in imminent danger. You must survive ! Your only option ; make your way to the 42nd barricade where the last forms of life lies. 

42nd Blockade is a 2D die & retry made in the Spooky Game Jam. The concept of this game is to show the player the first level of a game and of an adventure in a post-apocalyptic world.
